app_descript:
Samsung Video Library

Brief: Samsung Video Library is an intuitive video content management app designed specifically for select Samsung Galaxy devices. It serves as a powerful tool for organizing and viewing your video files conveniently, complete with a rich array of features to enhance user experience.

Core Features:

  • üìÅ Videos / Folders Tab: Easy navigation through video library by folding and tab system.
  • üîç Search & Sort: Efficiently find and order videos by title, time, and ascending/descending sorting options.
  • ü§è Pinch to Zoom: Enlarge thumbnails with multi-touch support for a closer look at video details.
  • üè∑Ô∏è File Tagging: Easy identification of special video types such as 360, DRM-protected, Slow motion, and Hyperlapse videos.
  • ‚úèÔ∏è Video Management: Offers video editor, delete functions, and sharing capabilities through various channels like email, Bluetooth, and Wi-Fi Direct.

Pros:

  • üëå User-friendly Interface: The app provides both list and grid views for personalized content organization.
  • ‚èØÔ∏è Resume Play: Includes a resume position card highlighting the last played video for quick access.
  • üîí Privacy Options: Ability to make videos private if the device supports Secure Folder, Private Mode, or KNOX service.
  • üîÑ Video Content Management: Rename, move, and select multiple videos for deletion or privacy settings effortlessly.

Cons:

  • üì± Device Limitation: Only available for select Samsung Galaxy series devices, which may exclude potential users with incompatible hardware.
  • üíå Basic Service Access: Certain features might require granting of mandatory storage access privileges.
  • üîÑ Hardware Dependency: Some features are dependent on the device's hardware capabilities, potentially limiting functionality.
  • üóÉÔ∏è Limited Editing Tools: Requires downloading an external Video Editor for advanced editing.

Price: üíµ The Samsung Video Library is a free app, although it may endorse additional downloads for extended functionality such as video editing.

Community: Unfortunately, no community information is available for Samsung Video Library.
